title: Draftpick freeze during bans
body: title says it all , It freezes while ppl are banning champions . happens once in a while but its annoying when it happens 2-3 times the same day and u gotta wait x amount of time , rito fix that asap or refund me 500000 IP

replies.body: After accepting a match, the servers picks everyone up and groups them together into champion select.  It seems that at this point your network is having trouble maintaining a connection and causing you to lose sync.  As a first step, I suggest going over the [connections issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for the quickest fixes.  This should get you squared away, but let me know if you have any issues!
